metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8844 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
The read_1g function in stream.c in liblrzip.so in lrzip 0.631 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted archive.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631+git180528-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.631+git180528-1').
